parameters.name: ApplicationArn
parameters.description: Specifies the ARN of the application. For more information about ARNs, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) and Amazon Web Services Service Namespaces in the Amazon Web Services General Reference.

nested_items.name: AssignmentRequired
nested_items.description: If AssignmentsRequired is true (default value), users don't have access to the application unless an assignment is created using the CreateApplicationAssignment API. If false, all users have access to the application.
